title: Flutter & Web Developer
name: Vazgen Arutyunyan
about_text1: My journey in IT began in 2017 when I first immersed myself in programming by learning C++ based on expert recommendations. Since then, I have been actively developing in web development, mastering technologies such as HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript with jQuery, Bootstrap 4/5, Node.js, Git, PHP, and Vue.js.
about_text2: For the past three years, I have focused on cross-platform application development using Flutter and the Dart programming language. This direction has allowed me to create efficient and modern applications that work across various platforms.
about_text3: My goal is to create quality digital solutions that meet modern requirements and help my clients achieve their goals. With each project, I continue to expand my knowledge and skills, staying at the forefront of technology.
services: We can provide you with services such as:
service1: Website layout according to the provided design
service2: Full-fledged website with conceptual design and prototype
service4: Video editing and processing of various complexity levels
service5: Custom logo design that sticks in memory
service6: Cross-platform apps for iOS, Android, and Web
overweb_description: OverWeb is my personal project, which I am developing together with a team of like-minded people. We create comprehensive solutions for web and mobile applications. Each member of our team is a specialist in their field: designers, developers, and video editors. Together, we combine our efforts to achieve the best results in every project.
